data.eml:eml: A new Nearctic Scolioneura (Hymenoptera, Tenthredinidae) mining leaves of Vaccinium (Ericaceae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Smith, David R., Eiseman, Charles S., Charney, Noah D., Record, Sydne (2015): A new Nearctic Scolioneura (Hymenoptera, Tenthredinidae) mining leaves of Vaccinium (Ericaceae). Journal of Hymenoptera Research 43: 1-8, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.43.4546, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/JHR.43.4546
